title: A Wedding- Good Omens Animatic
author: 3sides1eye
comment:
ok so i actually put a lot of thought into this so. here we go baby.
their wedding is garden of eden themed. that's why crowleys hair is long, it's the hair style he had in the garden. I tried to make it look like that but it's kinda hard 2 draw for an animatic lol. the design on the arm of aziras suit is meant to resemble the one that's on his ? to ga ??? in the garden. why is it garden of eden themed? because they're cheesy and that's where they met. madame tracy is holding on to the rings because in my head azira and her become great friends since they were 1 person for a little bit. dont get me wrong everyone in the apoclyanot becomes friends but ,,,madame tracy and azira get tea on weekends that just how it is. yes crowleys plants are at the wedding. he secretly loves them.
i'd kill to see a fusion between them
this is so cute and simple!!!  i love su and good omens and i enjoyed this so much!!!  i’m so happy you decided to do this!  your art style is absolutely gorgeous <3
I KNRW I WASNT THE ONLY ONE SEEING THE PARALLELS HERE!!
o mY gOsH the fusion is adorable

this animatic is a little chiller then my previous one and thats cuz?? 1) i find its easier to b more expressive when its music because theres more freedom and 2) im on vacation this week lol
